getting-started.title: ğŸ“– Chapter 1: Getting Started
getting-started.subtitle: Your First Steps to Becoming a FIRE Legend!

content.text: Welcome, future heist master! You've made the right choice picking up this guide. Within these pages lies the wisdom of countless gaming sessions, late nights, and epic victories. Let's begin your journey to financial independence!

content.title: ğŸŒŸ PRO TIP!
content.text: Before your first heist, take a moment to explore the Control Panel. Familiarize yourself with the Armory - that's where the REAL power lies!

content.title: The Goal
content.text: Your mission is simple: survive as many days as possible while collecting cash and avoiding obstacles. But don't let the simplicity fool you - mastering FIRE Heist takes dedication, skill, and a whole lot of style! ğŸ’°

content.title: Choosing Your Difficulty
content.text:
ğŸŸ¢ **ROOKIE**: Perfect for beginners! You'll have more energy, more fireballs, and a forgiving collision system. No shame in starting here - even the pros did!

ğŸŸ¡ **NOVICE**: The balanced experience. You'll need to manage your energy more carefully, but the rewards are greater.

ğŸ”´ **PRO**: Only for the truly dedicated! Energy is scarce, obstacles are unforgiving, and every decision matters. Good luck - you'll need it!

content.title: âš ï¸ HEADS UP!
content.text: Your difficulty choice affects your skill level unlock requirements. Higher difficulties = more bragging rights!

basic-moves.title: ğŸƒ Chapter 2: Basic Moves Mastery
basic-moves.subtitle: The Foundation of Every Great Heist

content.text: Before you can run, you must learn to jump! These core moves are available from day one and form the foundation of your entire skill set. Master these, and you'll be unstoppable!

content.name: Jump
content.description: The bread and butter of every heister. Time your jumps perfectly to soar over obstacles. Sounds simple? It is! But perfection takes practice.

content.name: Hurdle
content.description: A quick hop perfect for low obstacles. Faster recovery than a full jump, letting you chain moves together like a true acrobat!

content.name: Ground Pound
content.keys: G Key / X Button / Swipe Down
content.description: SLAM! Bring the thunder down on those pesky obstacles! This devastating move shatters anything beneath you. Pro tip: It's also the key to unlocking some of the game's most powerful abilities...

content.name: Fireball
content.description: Your trusty fireball! Hurl blazing projectiles to incinerate obstacles from a distance. Limited by difficulty level, so make each one count!

content.title: ğŸ† SPEEDRUN SECRET!
content.text: Chain a Jump into a Ground Pound for maximum obstacle destruction! The timing is tricky, but the payoff is HUGE!

content.name: Backflip
content.keys: B Key / LB Button / Swipe Right
content.description: Execute a stylish backward flip! Not just for show - the invincibility frames during the flip can save your bacon in tight situations.

content.name: Frontflip
content.keys: F Key / RB Button / Swipe Up
content.description: Flip forward with grace! Similar to the backflip but with forward momentum. Great for aggressive playstyles!

content.name: Corkscrew Spin
content.keys: C Key / LT Button / Swipe Left
content.description: SPIN TO WIN! This dizzying maneuver looks absolutely incredible and clears a nice vertical arc. Your friends will be jealous.

content.text: Welcome to the big leagues, heister! These advanced skills separate the casuals from the legends. Each one must be EARNED through dedication and skill. Ready to power up? ğŸš€

content.title: ğŸ” UNLOCK REQUIRED
content.text: Advanced skills must be unlocked through gameplay achievements. Check Chapter 5 for the complete unlock guide!

content.title: ğŸŸ¢ Enlisted Tier
content.text: The first step up from basic skills. Powerful enough to change your game, accessible enough that any dedicated player can earn them.

content.name: Shockwave
content.description: NEW! Generate a powerful shockwave that shatters obstacles AND pushes back anything in front of you! Perfect for when things get too crowded.
content.unlockHint: Master the Ground Pound to unlock this devastating upgrade...

content.name: Fire Spinner
content.description: Transform into a blazing vortex of destruction! Incinerates everything you touch during the spin. High energy cost, but SO worth it!
content.unlockHint: Incinerate enough obstacles to prove your worth...

content.name: Houdini
content.description: Now you see me... now you don't! Vanish in a puff of smoke and reappear safely. Pure escape artistry!
content.unlockHint: Show your mastery of fire to earn this magical ability...

content.title: ğŸ”µ Master Tier
content.text: Elite skills for elite players. These abilities can turn the tide of any heist, but unlocking them requires serious dedication!

content.name: Firestorm
content.description: ULTIMATE POWER! Rain fire from the sky, incinerating EVERYTHING on screen! The most powerful offensive ability in the game. Period.
content.unlockHint: Prove you can handle fire by incinerating 100 obstacles...

content.name: Jet Pack
content.description: Why jump when you can FLY? The Jet Pack grants unparalleled mobility. Soar above your problems - literally!
content.unlockHint: Perfect your hurdles to earn your wings...

content.title: ğŸ’¡ ENERGY TIP!
content.text: Master tier skills drain energy continuously. Watch that bar! Running out mid-skill can leave you vulnerable!

content.title: ğŸŸ£ Legendary Tier
content.text: The rarest and most powerful skills in FIRE Heist. Only the most dedicated players will ever see these abilities in action!

content.name: Fire Mage
content.description: Channel the power of a true pyromancer! Grants unlimited fireballs for a limited time. Absolute destruction mode!
content.unlockHint: Become one with the flame through countless incinerations...

skill-tiers.title: ğŸ“Š Chapter 4: The Tier System Explained
skill-tiers.subtitle: Understanding the Power Hierarchy

content.text: Not all skills are created equal! FIRE Heist uses a sophisticated tier system that affects not just power, but also your CASH MULTIPLIER! Here's the breakdown:

content.name: BASIC
content.description: Foundation skills. No cash bonus, but no unlock required either. Perfect for building your fundamentals!

content.name: COSMETIC
content.description: Style over substance! These skills look cool but don't boost your earnings. Sometimes, looking good IS the reward!

content.name: ENLISTED
content.description: Your first power boost! These skills are easier to unlock and grant a 25% cash bonus when you defeat obstacles with them!

content.name: MASTER
content.description: Elite tier! 50% more cash for every obstacle destroyed. These skills require serious commitment to unlock.

content.name: LEGENDARY
content.description: THE ULTIMATE! Double your cash earnings when using Legendary skills! These are the rarest abilities in the game.

content.title: ğŸ’° CASH STACKING!
content.text: The tier multiplier applies to ALL cash collected while the skill is active! Time your high-tier skills with cash bag spawns for MASSIVE earnings!

Energy is EVERYTHING in FIRE Heist! Every powerful move costs energy, and running out at the wrong moment can spell disaster. Master these secrets to become an energy efficiency expert! ğŸ’¡

content.title: Energy Basics
content.text:
Your energy bar regenerates slowly over time. The rate depends on your difficulty:

ğŸŸ¢ **Rookie**: Fast regeneration (200 max energy)
ğŸŸ¡ **Novice**: Medium regeneration (100 max energy)
ğŸ”´ **Pro**: Slow regeneration (50 max energy)

content.title: âš¡ REGEN SECRET!
content.text: Energy regenerates FASTER when you're not using abilities! Sometimes the best move is to play it safe and let your meter refill.

content.title: Energy Cost Guide
content.text:
Here's a quick reference for skill costs:

â€¢ **Free Skills**: Jump, Hurdle
â€¢ **Low Cost (5-15)**: Backflip, Frontflip, Corkscrew
â€¢ **Medium Cost (20-30)**: Ground Pound, Shockwave, Houdini
â€¢ **High Cost (50+)**: Fire Spinner, Fire Mage
â€¢ **Drain Skills**: Firestorm, Jet Pack (continuous drain!)

content.title: âš ï¸ DRAIN WARNING!
content.text: Skills with continuous drain will EMPTY your bar if you're not careful! Always check your energy before activating!

content.title: Advanced Energy Tactics
content.text:
ğŸ¯ **The 50% Rule**: Never let your energy drop below 50% unless you're going for a big play. You need reserves for emergencies!

ğŸ¯ **Burst Windows**: Save high-cost abilities for when multiple obstacles cluster together. Maximum value!

ğŸ¯ **Recovery Periods**: After using a drain skill, focus on basic moves while your energy recovers.

daily-challenge.title: ğŸ“… Chapter 7: Daily Challenge Domination
daily-challenge.subtitle: Compete for Glory Every Single Day!

content.text: Every day brings a new challenge! The Daily Challenge is your chance to compete against yourself and prove your skills. Different themes, different rules, same goal: SURVIVE! ğŸŒŸ

content.title: How It Works
content.text:
Each day at midnight, a new Daily Challenge appears with:

ğŸ¨ **Unique Theme**: Different visual style and music
ğŸ¯ **Set Difficulty**: The challenge decides your difficulty
ğŸ“Š **Leaderboard Entry**: Your score goes on the permanent record!

content.title: ğŸ… STREAK BONUS!
content.text: Complete daily challenges consecutively to build a win streak! The longer your streak, the more impressive your Hall of Fame entry!

content.title: Theme Strategies
content.text:
Different themes have different vibes:

ğŸ™ï¸ **Roadway**: Urban jungle, watch the headlights!

content.text: Each theme has its own soundtrack! Turn up the volume and feel the vibe of each environment!
Beyond the basic runner lies a world of secret personas! Each one has unique abilities, music, and style. Collect them all to become a true FIRE Heist master! ğŸ­

pro-tips.title: ğŸ’¡ Chapter 9: Pro Tips & Combos
pro-tips.subtitle: Secrets the Developers Don't Want You to Know!

content.text: Ready for the advanced class? These tips come straight from the top players. Study them, practice them, and dominate the leaderboards! ğŸ†

content.title: The Ground Pound Chain
content.text: String Ground Pounds together to unlock Shockwave AND Fiery Ground Pound! Focus on one strategy to maximize your unlock progress.

content.title: Energy Conservation
content.text: Basic Jump is FREE! Use it for most obstacles and save energy for emergencies. The best players use abilities sparingly.

content.title: Tier Timing
content.text: When a cash bag appears, activate your highest-tier ability! The multiplier applies to collected cash - not just destroyed obstacles!

content.title: The Hurdle Master Path
content.text: Flawless hurdles are the key to Jet Pack. Practice timing your hurdles PERFECTLY - no early jumps, no damage taken!

content.title: ğŸ® GAMEPAD ADVANTAGE!
content.text: Gamepad controls offer more precise timing for some moves! Try both control methods to find what works for you.

content.title: Easter Egg Hunt
content.text: Those mysterious eggs that appear rarely? Ground Pound them! Something special happens... ğŸ¥š

content.title: Incineration Farming
content.text: To maximize incinerations: Focus on skills that burn! Fireballs, Fire Spinner, and Firestorm all count toward your total.

content.title: ğŸ”¥ COMBO MASTER!
content.text: Some skills can chain together! Experiment with activating abilities mid-jump for interesting effects...
